name: SingleHand
description:
How to play: WASD to move, mouse to rotate, hold left click to hold an object, right click while holding to launch them, right click to craft.

 To craft, place 2 or more items that can be used to make something close to eachother and right click one of them. If it doesn't work it's because there's another item too close or those items can't be combined. If an item is the final one on a "crafting chain" there will be text on screen telling it.

[STARTING RECIPIES]:

  • wood 3x
  • rock 3x
  • wood + rock
  • gold + iron
  • wood + gold

There are 12 craftable items in total. Try out item combinations and see if you can find them all!
